forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 18C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 21C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 69F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High around 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. ENE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
